name: Sadoaiya
description: A program used for editing gmo models, made mainly with the goal of making them work in Persona 4 Golden.

name: P4GFusionEditor
description: A program made for editing P4G's persona fusion recipes

name: BamEditor
description: A program made for unpacking and repacking Atlus's 3DS bam model archive files

name: AmdTools
description: A set of netcore 3.1 tools made for editing Persona 4 Golden's amd files and files contained within them

name: BedTools
description: A set of netcore 3.1 tools made for unpacking and repacking atlus's (pre p5 era) bed and epl files.
